Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 11:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 13 with temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 13 with temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
